Detailed Guides

Step-by-step tutorials to help you master every aspect of Cuvio.

Getting Started with Cuvio

1

Download and Install

Download Cuvio from the App Store and create your account with your email address.

2

Set Your Preferences

Configure your dietary restrictions, cooking time preferences, household size, and any allergies.

3

Choose Your Persona

Select from 6 unique personas that match your cooking style and priorities.

4

Create Your First Meal Plan

Generate your first personalized meal plan and start cooking!

Configuring Your Settings

Dietary Preferences

  • • Set dietary restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, etc.)
  • • Add food allergies and intolerances
  • • Choose preferred cuisines and flavors
  • • Set spice level preferences

Cooking Preferences

  • • Set maximum cooking time per meal
  • • Choose your skill level
  • • Set household size for portion scaling
  • • Configure budget constraints

Creating and Managing Meal Plans

Three Meal Planning Modes

Plan Mode

Multi-day meal planning with breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks

Meal Mode

Single meal generation for quick inspiration

Leftovers Mode

Create meals from ingredients you already have

Customizing Your Plans

  • • Swap any recipe for alternatives or favorites
  • • Adjust portion sizes for your household
  • • Regenerate entire plans with different preferences
  • • Save favorite meals for future use

Using Smart Shopping Lists

Features

  • • Automatically generated from your meal plans
  • • Organized by store section for efficient shopping
  • • Scaled to your household size
  • • Check off items as you shop
  • • Share with family members

Tips for Success

  • • Review the list before shopping to ensure accuracy
  • • Check your pantry for items you already have
  • • Use the list to stay organized and avoid impulse purchases
  • • Update quantities if you're cooking for more people

Using the AI Assistant

What You Can Ask

  • • "What can I substitute for [ingredient]?"
  • • "How do I know when this is cooked properly?"
  • • "Can I make this without [allergen]?"
  • • "What's the best way to store leftovers?"
  • • "How can I make this spicier/milder?"

Getting Better Results

  • • Be specific about your dietary needs and preferences
  • • Ask follow-up questions for clarification
  • • The AI learns from your interactions over time
  • • Provide feedback on suggestions to improve future recommendations

Troubleshooting Common Issues

App Not Loading

  • • Check your internet connection
  • • Restart the app
  • • Update to the latest version
  • • Clear app cache if needed

Meal Plans Not Generating

  • • Check that all preferences are set correctly
  • • Ensure you have a stable internet connection
  • • Try reducing the number of dietary restrictions
  • • Contact support if the issue persists

Shopping List Issues

  • • Ensure you have generated a meal plan first
  • • Check that all recipes are properly loaded
  • • Try regenerating the meal plan
  • • Verify your household size is set correctly

Still Need Help?

Our support team is here to help you get the most out of Cuvio.

Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
